Description: Wi-Fi + Bluetooth microcontroller board for main control
Compact DC gear motor with built-in rotary encoder for speed/position feedback
Dual-channel motor driver module compatible with ESP32
1.2V AA rechargeable cells for powering the system
Smart charger for AA NiMH batteries
Momentary push button switch for user input
Assorted jumper wires for breadboard and module connections
Insulating tape for securing and protecting wiring
Assorted tubing for durable wire insulation
Basic soldering tool for assembling and repairing circuits
Mounting hub for attaching wheels to motor shafts
Rubber wheels for traction and movement
Plastic bevel gears for transferring motion at an angle
Lightweight structural rod for chassis reinforcement
